How to rent?

  • You can message us or call us to rent products and we will deliver it to you directly if possible.
  • You can pay us by UPI or cash ONLY.
  • If you don't want to continue your rent product, you can contact us and we will pick it up from your location if possible.
  • The subscription can be of 1 month, 3 months(Maximum) or even for 15 days(minimum),
    after that you have to renew your subscription to continue except for books.
